original_title: Let's Make Love and LIsten to Death from Above
overview: Shot on both b&w and color film stock, the 5-minute “Let’s Make Love and Listen to Death from Above” re-animates “illicit” trades that took place, emphasizing the “desire and affect that still roam and haunt the Chelsea District.” [Overview Courtesy of Microscope Gallery]
title: Let's Make Love and LIsten to Death from Above
